alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Pierce, southeastern Atkinson, northwestern Ware, south central Bacon and north central Clinch Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Manor, or 12 miles north of Argyle, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Pebble Hill, Manor, Dixie Union, Needham, Millwood and Bickley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Northern Ware; Pierce
